getProperties

public java.util.Iterator getProperties(java.lang.String section,
                                        java.lang.String key)
Retrieves an Iterator of values for the named property. If the property only has a single value a one item iterator will be returned rather than forcing the caller to check for null and recall the getProperty() method.

propertyNames

public SWConfig augment(SWConfig addFrom)

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Usage: java org.crosswire.sword.mgr.SWConfig []. Prints the contents of each configuration file to STDOUT.
